body_html:
Thanks @kbsriram . This is pretty neat.

Though, I'm a bit confused about why we need to explicitly list out all the -Xep flags. Is there some documentation you can point to? http://errorprone.info/docs/installation suggests that "Error Prone works out of the box with bazel".

Ideally we wouldn't have to list out 125 lines of flags :), so I'd like to understand the configuration here a bit better.

Thanks @kbsriram . This is pretty neat.

Though, I'm a bit confused about why we need to explicitly list out all the `-Xep` flags. Is there some documentation you can point to? http://errorprone.info/docs/installation suggests that "Error Prone works out of the box with bazel".

Ideally we wouldn't have to list out 125 lines of flags :), so I'd like to understand the configuration here a bit better.
